Articles.Content: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
1.0 Is less than 2 miles away! Choo choo!

[http://gamelab.mit.edu/games/a-slower-speed-of-light/](http://gamelab.mit.edu/games/a-slower-speed-of-light/)

Recomended "Reading" when boarding the KSP 1.0 HYPE TRAIN. We have broken the speed of light barrier! Onwards!

> 
> In band-
> Plays Ksp theme on trombone-
> 
> Everyone joins in
> 
> Gets everyone huped

Did that really happen?!

> 
> Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

Can't you at least say hype?

> 
> lol, I just got a call from work. Everyone except for the manager and director in my department called in sick today. My boss left me a message on my phone asking me to come in (it's my day off, I'm not going in). Me and the other 5 guys in the department are all big Kerbal players. I doubt they are sick... they are here... somewhere in the cars of they hype train. I should call them all and see if they want to have a launch party; I hear that booze, rocketry and general unprofessionalism go together pretty good.

Sounds like you didn't get a party invite

> 
> We'll just need a new conductor for the end of the journey. Any candidates?

I don't know much about driving this thing, but I'm good with the mechanisms of the train!

> 
> Current ActivityModifying PostLast ActivityToday 10:08 
> Current ActivityModifying PostLast ActivityToday 10:08 
> 
> Current ActivityModifying PostLast ActivityToday 10:08 
> 
> Current ActivityModifying PostLast ActivityToday 10:08 
> 
> Current ActivityModifying PostLast ActivityToday 10:08 
> 
> Current ActivityModifying PostLast ActivityToday 10:08

What does that actualy mean? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> 1.0 Is less than 2 miles away! Choo choo!

\*Terra Light Years. Ludicrous speeds.

> 
> 1.0 Is less than 2 miles away! Choo choo!

We're going over 9000 miles per second. Damn relativistic speeds.

> 
> Were breaking EVERYTHING! KerbalX, the fourms, the FREAKIN LAWS OF PHYSICS

Next in line! STEAM DOWNLOADS SERVERS!

Let's press spacebar. Kerbal style.

> 
> You bunch of stalkers. xD

Hey, they're HYPE stalkers. I'm just a hype spammer~
what is that I see, a slowing hype train?? impossible. Add moar boosters for hype!

> 
> Can't you at least say hype?

he did, doppler effect
I can't drive, but I'll keep the firebox stoked.

> 
> Next in line! STEAM DOWNLOADS SERVERS!
> Let's press spacebar. Kerbal style.

I remap space to tab~

> 
> what is that i see, a slowing hype train?? Impossible. Add moar boosters for hype!

engineeeeeers! We need moar boosters!!

> 
> engineeeeeers! We need moar boosters!!

Everyone! We need MOAR boosters.
I have my space bar set up as an f5!

> 
> Leave now?! When we need you most!? How could you!?

I said 1:10 EDT. It's only 11:13 yet! I can still be here!
The KerbalX countdown is dead!

> 
> I can't drive, but I'll keep the firebox stoked.

I have a sailplane pilot's license. I guess hype trains and sailplanes are not so differrent. Though I was thinking about going home from work...

EDIT: No need. GregorX is back! YIPEEE!
sound waves can be used as propulsion, direct the hype towards the back!
3 pages to 350!!

> 
> I have my space bar set up as an f5!

Less F5, moar hype~
